about.title: About me
about.description1: Passionate about technology, and being able to transform ideas into software that provides a solution to a problem. I like challenges and consider myself a self-taught person who likes to learn and explore new things.
about.description2: I am a Software Engineer, with more than 8 years of experience participating in the development of software solutions for various companies in different sectors
